description: Leading Agile development in a Scrum team for a modular healthcare software platform. Built scalable Angular + Nx frontends and Node.js (NestJS) APIs. Integrated CI/CD workflows via GitHub Actions and Docker. Focused on frontend performance, code quality, and mentoring.

Worked on a clinical trial management product. Developed Angular-based frontend with RxJS and component libraries in Storybook. Advocated Cypress E2E testing. Collaborated in an Agile team to release product iterations biweekly.

Built health diagnostics dashboards using Angular, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Deployed on AWS EC2. Delivered REST APIs with Express and implemented monitoring and logging. Participated in cross-functional Agile teams.
